relevant_findings.general: Alert and oriented, weak, lying in bed with eyes closed, answers slowly in a soft voice
relevant_findings.HEENT: No scleral icterus, mucous membranes moist
relevant_findings.cardiovascular: Regular rate and rhythm, no murmur/gallop/rub
relevant_findings.pulmonary: Clear to auscultation bilaterally, no wheezes/rales/rhonchi
relevant_findings.abdominal: Soft, nondistended, tenderness to palpation in right lower quadrant with a palpable mass in the middle lower abdomen, no rebound or guarding, normoactive bowel sounds
relevant_findings.DRE: Normal tone, no gross or occult blood
relevant_findings.extremities: No edema, warm and well perfused
